snippet: The sketch-comedy series “Key & Peele” begins its third season Wednesday night on Comedy Central.
abstract: Mike Hale remarks on comedic styles of Keegan-Michael Key and Jordan Peele, whose show Key & Peele is set to start its third season on Comedy Central.
lead_paragraph: The sketch-comedy series “Key & Peele” begins its third season Wednesday night on Comedy Central.

headline.print_headline: Comic Bits Stitched Together With Irreverence
headline.main: Comic Bits Stitched Together With Irreverence
